data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Jałoszyński, Paweł (2017): Taxonomy of ' Euconnus complex'. Part XVI. Alloconophron Franz transferred to Anhoraeomorphus Franz as subgenus, with notes on systematic position of Noctophus Casey (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae). Zootaxa 4358 (2), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4358.2.6
